trans-unit.source: Used to specify the type of event, and its arguments (if any) to be generated as part of the rendering of text to speech by a custom synthetic speech engine.
trans-unit.target: Consente di specificare il tipo di evento e i relativi argomenti (se presente) da generato dal motore vocale sintetica personalizzato come parte del rendering di sintesi vocale.

trans-unit.source: A custom speech synthesis engine requests the generation of events under the Speech Platform by providing an appropriate SpeechEventInfo instance to <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> engine site object passed to implementations of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Motore di sintesi vocale personalizzato richiede la generazione di eventi in una piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale, fornendo un'istanza SpeechEventInfo appropriata per <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A>appartenente il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>oggetto sito motore passato alle implementazioni di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Constucts an appropriate <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto appropriato <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Permitted values used for `parameterType`, `param1`, and `param2` and their meaning is dictated by the type of event being requested, as specified by the member of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> used for `eventId`.
trans-unit.target: Consentito di valori utilizzati per `parameterType`, `param1`, e `param2` e il relativo significato dipende dal tipo di evento richiesto, come specificato dal membro della <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>utilizzato per `eventId`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on appropriate values for `parameterType`, `param1`, and `param2`, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> The type of the events which can be handled by the Speech platform infrastructure can be obtained through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the synthesizer engine site implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate sui valori appropriati per `parameterType`, `param1`, e `param2`, vedere la documentazione per <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>il tipo di eventi che possono essere gestiti dall'infrastruttura di piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale può essere ottenuto tramite la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>proprietà sull'implementazione di sito del motore sintetizzatore <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId"></xref> indicating the sort of Speech platform event the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object is to handle.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId"> </xref> che indica il tipo di evento piattaforma vocale il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> oggetto consiste nel gestire.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType"></xref> indicating how the <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""></xref> reference of `param2` is to be interpreted, and, by implication, the use of `param1`.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType"> </xref> che indica come il <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""> </xref> riferimento di `param2` deve essere interpretato e, in modo implicito, l'utilizzo di `param1`.

trans-unit.source: An integer value to be passed to the Speech platform when the event requested by the instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> to be constructed is generated.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero deve essere passato quando l'evento richiesto dall'istanza di piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> deve essere costruita viene generata.

trans-unit.source: The exact meaning of this integer is implicitly determined by the value of `parameterType`.
trans-unit.target: Il significato esatto di questo numero intero in modo implicito è determinato dal valore di `parameterType`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""></xref> instance referencing an object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""> </xref> istanza che fa riferimento un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: to be passed to the Speech platform when the event requested by the instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> to be constructed is generated.
trans-unit.target: deve essere passato quando l'evento richiesto dall'istanza di piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> deve essere costruita viene generata.

trans-unit.source: The type which must be referenced is explicitly defined by the value `parameterType`.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di cui è necessario fare riferimento in modo esplicito è definito dal valore `parameterType`.

trans-unit.source: The value <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr.Zero" name="System.IntPtr.Zero" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr.Zero" name="System.IntPtr.Zero" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified object is an instance of `SpeechEventInfo` and equal to the current instance of `SpeechEventInfo`.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un oggetto specificato è un'istanza di `SpeechEventInfo` e uguale all'istanza corrente di `SpeechEventInfo`.

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da valutare.

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se obj è uguale all'oggetto corrente oggetto; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified `SpeechEventInfo` object is equal to the current instance of `SpeechEventInfo`.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un oggetto `SpeechEventInfo` oggetto è uguale all'istanza corrente di `SpeechEventInfo`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> oggetto da valutare.

trans-unit.source: if other is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se other è uguale all'oggetto corrente oggetto; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the Speech platform event which an instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> is used to request.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene e imposta l'evento di piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale che un'istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> viene utilizzato per richiesta.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId"></xref> as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_short" name="short" href=""></xref>, indicating the event type the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object is to generate.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro di <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId"> </xref> come un <xref uid="langword_csharp_short" name="short" href=""> </xref>, che indica il tipo di evento di <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> oggetto consiste nel generare.

trans-unit.source: Provides a hash code for a `SpeechEventInfo` object.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un codice hash per un `SpeechEventInfo` oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash per un <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of `SpeechEventInfo` are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due istanze di `SpeechEventInfo` sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to compare to `event2`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> oggetto da confrontare con `event2`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to compare to `event1`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> oggetto da confrontare con `event1`.

trans-unit.source: if event1 is the same as event2; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if event1 is the same as event2; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of `SpeechEventInfo` are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due istanze di `SpeechEventInfo` non sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to compare to `event2`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> oggetto da confrontare con `event2`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to compare to `event1`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> oggetto da confrontare con `event1`.

trans-unit.source: if event1 is different from event2; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if event1 is different from event2; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the value (param1 in the constructor) to be passed to the Speech platform to generate an event the current instance of is used to request.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un set di valore ( param1 nel costruttore) deve essere passato per la piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale per generare un evento, l'istanza corrente di viene utilizzato a richiesta.

trans-unit.source: The requirements and meaning of Param1 property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: I requisiti e il significato della proprietà Param1 di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>vengono determinati in modo univoco dai valori del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A>le proprietà di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>istanza.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use Param1, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate su come utilizzare Param1, vedere la documentazione per <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> to be passed to Speech platform when the event specified by the current instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> is generated.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> deve essere passato quando l'evento specificato dall'istanza corrente della piattaforma vocale <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> viene generato.

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the instance (param2 in the constructor) referencing the object to be passed to the Speech platform to generate an event the current instance of is used to request.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un set di istanza ( param2 nel costruttore) fa riferimento all'oggetto da passare per la piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale per generare un evento, l'istanza corrente di viene utilizzato a richiesta.

trans-unit.source: The requirements on the `System.IntPtr` reference of the Param2 property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: I requisiti per il `System.IntPtr` riferimento della proprietà Param2 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>vengono determinati in modo univoco dai valori del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A>proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>istanza.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use Param2, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate su come utilizzare Param2, vedere la documentazione per <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""></xref> referencing the object to be passed to Speech platform when the event specified by the current instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> is generated.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""> </xref> fa riferimento all'oggetto deve essere passato quando l'evento specificato dall'istanza corrente della piattaforma vocale <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> viene generato.

trans-unit.source: Returns the data type of the object pointed to by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""></xref> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*> parameter on the current <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il tipo di dati dell'oggetto a cui fa riferimento il <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""> </xref> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*>parametro corrente <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*>

trans-unit.source: The requirements on the `System.IntPtr` reference of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and ParameterType properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: I requisiti per il `System.IntPtr` riferimento del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>proprietà di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>vengono determinati in modo univoco dai valori del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>e le proprietà ParameterType di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>istanza.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate su come utilizzare <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>, vedere la documentazione per <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_short" name="short" href=""></xref> value corresponding to a member of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType"></xref> enumeration and indicating the data type of the object pointed to by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""></xref> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*> parameter and used as the second argument for the constructor of the current <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_short" name="short" href=""> </xref> valore corrispondente a un membro del <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType"> </xref> enumerazione e che indica il tipo di dati dell'oggetto a cui fa riferimento il <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""> </xref> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*>parametro e utilizzato come secondo argomento per il costruttore dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*>
